name: CPU Load
description: Checks 1-minute load average and warns if load exceeds 2× CPU cores.
check_cmd: CORES=$(nproc 2>/dev/null || echo 4); LOAD=$(awk '{print int($1)}' /proc/loadavg); THRESHOLD=$((CORES * 2)); if [ $LOAD -lt $THRESHOLD ]; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi
fix_cmd: echo '⚠️  High CPU load detected'; echo 'Top CPU consumers:'; ps -eo pid,comm,%cpu --sort=-%cpu | head -10; echo 'Load average:'; uptime
verify_cmd: if awk '{print int($1)}' /proc/loadavg | grep -q '^[0-9]$'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
